attributes.action: Extend Theory Test Certificate due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Taking the theory tests for many isn’t and easy tasks and a lot of effort has gone into it. For many they would’ve had already 4 months left on their theory test certificate before expiring. For many driving tests have already been changed and delayed. The Government should extend all Theory test certificates in line with practical tests and give chance to those individuals as to such time they can take their practical test.
attributes.background: Extend the Theory test certificate due to lockdown similar all vehicle tests temporarily suspended or extended.
